c:attribute.name: email
c:attribute.description: The email address for the person

c:attribute.name: mobileNumber
c:attribute.description: The mobile phone number for the person

c:attribute.name: mobileNotificationEndpoints
c:attribute.description: The list of mobile endpoints where notifications may be sent

c:attribute.name: currPlace
c:attribute.description: The ID of the current place where the person is present

c:attribute.name: currPlaceMethod
c:attribute.description: The methodology used for determining the current place

c:attribute.name: currLocation
c:attribute.description: The current location of the person

c:attribute.name: currLocationTime
c:attribute.description: The time that the current location was determined

c:attribute.name: currLocationMethod
c:attribute.description: The methodology used for determining the current location

c:attribute.name: consentOffersPromotions
c:attribute.description: The date and time when this person provided consent to receive communications of offers and promotions

c:attribute.name: consentStatement
c:attribute.description: The date and time where person provided consent to receive monthly statement communications

c:attribute.name: hasPin
c:attribute.description: Returns true if the person has a pin, false otherwise. This is deprecated and only returns true if the person at a pin at currPlace, placesWithPin is preferred

c:attribute.name: placesWithPin
c:attribute.description: Returns the set of places the person has a pin assigned

c:attribute.name: hasLogin
c:attribute.description: Returns true if the person has a login, false otherwise

c:method.name: SetSecurityAnswers
c:method.description: Sets the security answers for the given person. The first question and answer are required, those for the second and third are optional.

c:parameter.name: securityQuestion1
c:parameter.description: The identifier for the first question answered

c:parameter.name: securityAnswer1
c:parameter.description: The user's answer for the question identified in securityQuestion1

c:parameter.name: securityQuestion2
c:parameter.description: The identifier for the second question answered

c:parameter.name: securityAnswer2
c:parameter.description: The user's answer for the question identified in securityQuestion2

c:parameter.name: securityQuestion3
c:parameter.description: The identifier for the third question answered

c:parameter.name: securityAnswer3
c:parameter.description: The user's answer for the question identified in securityQuestion3

c:method.name: GetSecurityAnswers
c:method.description: Retrieves the security responses for the given person

c:return.description: A map where the key is the identifier for the security question and the value is the user's answer
c:return.name: securityAnswers

c:method.name: AddMobileDevice
c:method.description: Adds and associates a mobile device for the given person

c:parameter.name: name
c:parameter.description: A user-assigned name for this mobile device; useful when specifying which devices will receive notifications.

c:parameter.name: appVersion
c:parameter.description: The version of the Iris app running on the device.

c:parameter.name: osType
c:parameter.description: The type of operating system the mobile device is running (iOS, Android for example).

c:parameter.name: osVersion
c:parameter.description: The version of the operating system running on the mobile device.

c:parameter.name: formFactor
c:parameter.description: The form factor of the device (phone, tablet for example).

c:parameter.name: phoneNumber
c:parameter.description: The phone number of the device if present.

c:parameter.name: deviceIdentifier
c:parameter.description: Device specific unique identifier for the mobile device if possible.

c:parameter.name: deviceModel
c:parameter.description: The model of the device if known.

c:parameter.name: deviceVendor
c:parameter.description: The vendor of the device if known.

c:parameter.name: resolution
c:parameter.description: The screen resolution of the device (ex. xhdpi)

c:parameter.name: notificationToken
c:parameter.description: The token for sending push notifications to this device if it is registered to do so.

c:parameter.name: lastLatitude
c:parameter.description: The last measured latitude if collected.

c:parameter.name: lastLongitude
c:parameter.description: The last measured longitude if collected.

c:method.name: RemoveMobileDevice
c:method.description: Removes/disassociates a mobile device from this person

c:parameter.name: deviceIndex
c:parameter.description: Platform-owned index for the device that uniquely identifies it within the context of this person

c:method.name: ListMobileDevices
c:method.description: Lists all mobile devices associated with this person

c:return.name: mobileDevices
c:return.description: The list of mobile devices associated with this person

c:method.name: ListHistoryEntries
c:method.description: Returns a list of all the history log entries associated with this person

c:parameter.name: limit
c:parameter.description: The maximum number of events to return (defaults to 10)

c:parameter.name: token
c:parameter.description: The token from a previous query to use for retrieving the next set of results

c:return.name: nextToken
c:return.description: The token to use for getting the next page, if null there is no next page

c:return.name: results
c:return.description: The entries associated with this person

c:method.name: RemoveFromPlace
c:method.description: Removes a person from a specific place. If the person is a hobbit they will be completely deleted.

c:parameter.name: placeId
c:parameter.description: The place to remove the person from. If not provided the place header (active place) from the message will be used.

c:method.name: ChangePin
c:method.description: Changes the person's pin at their currPlace. Deprecated, use ChangePinV2 instead.

c:parameter.name: currentPin
c:parameter.description: The current pin of the person if they have one. If they have a pin this must match their existing pin

c:parameter.name: newPin
c:parameter.description: The new pin for the person

c:return.name: success
c:return.description: True if the pin was successfully changed, false otherwise

c:error.description: If no person exists with that ID.
If the pin isn't unique at this place.

c:method.name: ChangePinV2
c:method.description: Changes the person's pin at the specified place. People are allowed to change their own pin or a hobbit at the specified place assuming the person invoking the call has access to the place.

c:parameter.name: place
c:parameter.description: The identifier for the place where the person will use the pin

c:parameter.name: pin
c:parameter.description: The pin to set for the person

c:return.name: success
c:return.description: True if the pin was successfully changed, false otherwise

c:error.description: If no person exists with that ID.
If the place is blank, empty, or missing.
If the pin is blank, empty, or missing.
If the pin doesn't have exactly 4 characters or contains non-digit characters.
If the pin isn't unique at this place.

c:method.name: VerifyPin
c:method.description: Verifies that the pins match and that the requester is logged in as the person that the pin is being verified for.

c:parameter.name: place
c:parameter.description: The identifier of the place with the pin for the person to compare against

c:parameter.name: pin
c:parameter.description: The pin to compare against

c:return.name: success
c:return.description: True if the pin successfully matches current pin, false otherwise

c:parameter.description: The invitation code the person is rejecting

c:method.name: PendingInvitations
c:method.description: Retrieves the list of pending invitations for this user

c:return.name: invitations
c:return.description: The list of all pending invitations that could be associated with this user or empty

c:method.name: PromoteToAccount
c:method.description: Promotes a user with a login to full fledged IRIS account

c:parameter.name: place
c:parameter.description: The place information or the new account

c:return.name: account
c:return.description: The instance of AccountModel created for the new registration

c:return.name: place
c:return.description: The instance of PlaceModel created for the place

c:method.name: DeleteLogin
c:method.description: Deletes complete the login and any associations with it

c:method.name: ListAvailablePlaces
c:method.description: Lists the available places for a person. Returns the same structure as the session service's method

c:return.name: places
c:return.description: The places this person has access to

c:method.name: AcceptPolicy
c:method.description: Accept terms & conditions and/or privacy policy

c:parameter.name: type
c:parameter.description: PRIVACY for privacy policy, TERMS for terms & condition. In order to accept both, need to call the method twice.

c:method.name: RejectPolicy
c:method.description: Reject terms & conditions and/or privacy policy. NOTE THIS IS GENERALLY FOR TESTING ONLY

c:parameter.name: type
c:parameter.description: PRIVACY for privacy policy, TERMS for terms & condition. In order to reject both, need to call the method twice.

c:event.description: Emitted when an invitation has been sent to this user
